    Machine Learning and Deep Learning

    OSU Courses

    • Machine Learning and Data Mining (CS 434) [Repository of the course]
    • Deep Learning (CS 419 for undergrad, CS 535 for grad)

    Online Resources

    • Coursera (you can audit):
      • Machine Learning: Great course, explains everything in details clearly for Machine Learning. [Octave]
      • Deep Learning Specialization: Best resouces that we recommend. Explains everything you need to know to build an entire pipeline with great exercises. [Python and Tensorflow 1.X]
      • TensorFlow in Practice Specialization: Simple course that explains TensorFlow 2.0 new APIs with general examples for different applications. [Python and Tensorflow 2.X]
    • Practical Deep Learning for Coders - fast.ai

    Books

    • Machine Learning by Tom M. Mitchell: Old book, easy to understand.
    • Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning by Christopher M. Bishop: Covers everything in Machine Learning, more in-depth understanding, uses a lot of mathematical terms and equations.
    • Deep Learning by Ian Goodfellow, Yoshua Bengio, and Aaron Courville: Covers everything in Deep Learning with fundamentals.
